thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 5 of 137
thread.title: Donna Thomas-Taylor

author: Donna Thomas-Taylor
title: Donna Thomas-Taylor
text:
Sue is very experienced with dogs, how to introduce them to each other when they are new and we even had updates with the first visit so we knew he was in good hands. We highly recommend Sue I to anyone looking for a great place for your dog to roam and have excellent care.
Thank you Sue I, Crosby is a very happy 13 year old puppy. Hehe!!
Donna & Tom
